text: 1915 (MCMXV) was a common year starting on Friday in the Gregorian calendar and a common year starting on Thursday in the Julian calendar. == Events == * January 26 - President Woodrow Wilson says yes to making Rocky Mountain National Park. * February 8 - The Birth of a Nation is released. * April 24 – The Armenian genocide begins. * May 23 - The Italian Campaign of World War I begins. * November 17 - Morocco starts using its current flag. == Births == === January === * February 1 – Stanley Matthews, English footballer (d. 2000) === February === === March === === April === * April 21 – Anthony Quinn, Mexican-American actor (d. 2001) * April 27 – Hovhannes Shiraz, Armenian poet (d. 1984) === May === * May 6 – Orson Welles, American movie director, screenwriter and actor (d. 1985) === June === * June 4 – Modibo Keïta, 1st President of Mali (d. 1977) * June 28 – David Honeyboy Edwards, American blues guitarist and singer === July === * July 28 - Frankie Yankovic, American polka musician (d. 1998) === August === * August 29 – Ingrid Bergman, Swedish actress (d. 1982) === September === * September 6 – Franz Josef Strauß, German politician (d. 1988) === October === * October 24 – Bob Kane, American cartoonist (d. 1998) === November === * November 25 – Augusto Pinochet, Chilean ruler (d. 2006) === December === * December 12 – Frank Sinatra, American singer and actor (d. 1998) * December 19 – Édith Piaf, French singer (d. 1963) == Deaths == * April 27 – Alexander Scriabin, Russian composer (b. 1872) * November 14 – Booker T. Washington, American inventor, educator, and writer (b. 1856)
